name: UICloudSharingController
desc: A view controller that presents standard screens for adding and removing people from a CloudKit share record.

items.name: init(preparationHandler: (UICloudSharingController, (CKShare?, CKContainer?, Error?) -> Void) -> Void)
items.desc: Initializes the CloudKit sharing controller with a preparation handler intending to save a new share record.

items.name: init(share: CKShare, container: CKContainer)
items.desc: Initializes the CloudKit sharing view controller with a CloudKit share record and container to manage participants and restrictions.

items.name: var delegate: UICloudSharingControllerDelegate?
items.desc: A reference to an object that conforms to the CloudKit sharing controller delegate protocol.

items.name: protocol UICloudSharingControllerDelegate
items.desc: The protocol you implement to provide additional information to, and receive notifications from, the CloudKit sharing controller.

items.name: var availablePermissions: UICloudSharingController.PermissionOptions
items.desc: A combination of permission and access options made available to the user when viewing screens presented by the CloudKit sharing controller.

items.name: struct UICloudSharingController.PermissionOptions
items.desc: A set of options that determine the permission options available to the user when viewing the Cloud sharing controller screens.

items.name: var share: CKShare?
items.desc: A reference to the CloudKit share record used by the CloudKit sharing controller.

items.name: func activityItemSource() -> UIActivityItemSource
items.desc: The activity item object that can be used by an activity view controller.
